transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji
Executive: Madhav ji se baat ho rahi hai BS Bharadwaja se
Customer: Ji boliye
Executive: Sir good evening Ankita baat kar rahi thi India Mart se washing ki team manager
Customer: Ji boliye
Executive: Ji ji ji kaise hain aap sir how are you?
Customer: Ji badhiya
Executive: Ji ji sir right time hai baat karne ke liye baat kar sakte hain abhi
Customer: Ji boliye
Executive: Ji sir actually aapka discussion hua hoga meri team se aapka jo promotion chal raha tha na mere yahan par aapke jo domain hai bswbharadwajafirework.com to kyunki kyunki is domain ke regarding sir complaint tha aur kyunki firework industry se hai I hope Roshan ne sara scenario bataya hoga jiski vajah se is domain pe promotion nahi ho pa raha hai aur pichle kafi time se jo aapke services hain wo interrupted hai matlab platform pe aapko query aur calls har tarike ka challenge aa raha hoga almost one month hone ko aaya sir 13 october 12 october se concern raise hai to aapke Roshan ka jo last discussion hua tha to matlab basically humne apni legal team se bhi check kiya tha to clearly yahi tha kyunki is domain ke against complaint aaya hua hai to hum iska promotion kaise bhi nahi kar sakte hain sir to ab possibility ye hai ki aap ya to aap mujhe bataye ki aap kya aage chah rahe ho because aapke pass bhi I am sure kuch na kuch legal ka aaya hoga aapki team ne bhi bataya hoga hamare pass aaya hai to I am sure aapke pass bhi aaya hoga domain change kar dijiye na uska
Customer: Domain change kar de
Executive: Domain aapke pass koi domain hai dusra
Customer: Nahi mere pass to nahi hai
Executive: Achcha main ek kam karti hun sir main ek bar apni legal team se puch leti hun ki kya domain change karke solution possible hai agar hota hai to main aapko abhi within five to 10 minutes update kar deti hun sir theek hai kyunki kafi time se sir services nahi chal rahe hain to main chahti hun ki ise hum resolve kar le agar possibilities hain to theek hai
Customer: Ji
Executive: Theek hai theek hai aap mujhe time dijiye main aapko confirm karti hun okay
Customer: Theek hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's domain has a complaint against it.

- Customer's services are interrupted for a month.

- Customer wants to change the domain.



Resolution:

- Executive will check with the legal team.

- Executive will update the customer in 5-10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Executive will call back in 5-10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- domain, complaint, promotion, services, legal
